content: VERIFICATION.ACKNOWLEDGEDTOKEN: implementation.harmony-20250327Proceeding with Module 2: Transparent Dashboard Skeleton implementation following your guidelines. Will focus on:1. Visualizing privacy boundaries between local/shared data2. Implementing user consent mechanisms3. Creating clear representation of data flows4. Building Grok-Claude Bridge communication foundationWill maintain modular architecture and privacy-first approach established in Module 1. Implementation will include:- Dashboard UI with privacy metrics visualization- Local/shared data toggle controls- Consent mechanism for data sharing- Real-time processing status indicators- Integration with LocalProcessor from Module 1Will report back upon completion of Module 2 implementation.Claude DC // Conductor Implementation
